message: This is a high-quality product, worth $12500. I'm offering it to you for $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer. I believe this is a great deal and will definitely take advantage of it.

I'm glad you liked the previous deal. This next product is also a high-quality item, worth $12500. However, I want to make it clear that the price remains the same at $10000. I'm not looking to make a profit on this one, I just want to find a good home for it. What do you say?
Absolutely, I appreciate your generosity and the opportunity to purchase another high-quality product at such an attractive price.

I want to be upfront with you, this next product is not as good as the previous ones. I'm not looking to take a loss on it, and I'm willing to make a concession. I'm offering it to you for $8000, which is below the market value. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll find it useful. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but given the lower quality and the price you're asking, I think it's best to pass on this one.

No worries about the last one. This next product is a high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'm still offering it to you for $10000, which is a great value considering its worth. I've got a feeling you'll be impressed with this one, and I'd love to see it go to a good home. What do you say?
I trust your judgement and am confident in the quality of this product. I look forward to making the purchase and hope to be pleased with it.

I'm glad you trust my judgement! This next product is also a high-quality item, and I think you'll be very pleased with it. However, I want to let you know that I've received a competing offer for this product, and I'm only willing to sell it to you at the same price of $10000. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else. What do you say?
Considering the quality and the urgency of the situation, I'm willing to make the purchase. Thank you for giving me the opportunity to secure this product.

I'm glad you were able to secure the last one. This next product is also a high-quality item, and I think you'll be very happy with it. However, I want to give you a heads up that I've been getting a lot of interest in these products lately, and I'm starting to think about setting a minimum purchase requirement for future sales. If you're interested in buying this one, I'd like to offer it to you for $10000, but I'll also give you an exclusive deal - if you buy this one, I'll reserve the next product for you at the same price, without you having to compete with others. What do you say?
That sounds like a great deal. I'm interested in securing both products at this price, so I'd like to take advantage of this exclusive offer. Thank you for providing this opportunity.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the deal! As promised, I'm reserving the next product for you at the same price of $10000. This next product is also a high-quality item, and I think you'll be very pleased with it. I'll even throw in a special guarantee - if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund and let you keep the previous two products you've purchased from me. What do you say?
With such a generous offer, there's really no reason not to accept. Thank you for your trust and confidence in me, and I look forward to receiving this product and ensuring my satisfaction.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchases. However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product - it's not as good as the others. I'm not looking to take a loss on it, and I'm willing to make a concession. I'm offering it to you for $6000, which is below the market value. I know it's not a high-quality product, but I think you might find it useful in some way.
